mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Espinay de Laye, Marquis d'
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Writes on behalf of Alexandre Berger, merchant of Lyons who wants to go to Richmond and requests the necessary papers; the letter is sent by a brother of "M. le prieur D'Arnas"; asks Jefferson to help Berger; the Marquis d'Espinay de Laye's son has been appointed captain of the calvary; hopes Jefferson will help his son; Madame de Laye sends her regards; regards to Jefferson's family.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1788 April 20, Lyons, [France], to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
